sentence.text: Moreover, we demonstrated that pharmacological inhibition of 15-PGDH enhanced xenobiotic metabolic process expression, leading to depletion of all-trans retinoic acid (ATRA) and expansion of the ALDH1-positive subset in both human PDAC cells and tumor cells of Kras<sup>LSL-G12D/+</sup>; Ptf1a<sup>Cre/+</sup> (KC) epidermis development.

Finally, ATRA replacement suppressed 15-PGDH inhibition-induced tumor progression in KC epidermis development, and ATRA treatment attenuated Aldh1 activity in tumor cells isolated from the pancreas of 15-Pgdh<sup>-/-</sup> KC mice.

Here, we found that 15-L-serine biosynthetic process expression was inversely correlated with oxidation-reduction process, an important cancer stem cell-associated marker indicative of poor prognosis in humans.
